meanings.definition: To hit or beat someone repeatedly, especially with a stick or whip.
meanings.sent1: The bully drubs the poor kid every day after school.
meanings.sent2: The boxer drubs his opponent with powerful punches.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten drubs the yarn ball as if it's its mortal enemy.
meanings.sent4: The storm drubs the windows with raindrops, creating a rhythmic sound.
meanings.sent5: The drummer drubs the drums with passion, creating an electrifying beat.

meanings.definition: To defeat decisively in a competition or contest.
meanings.sent1: The chess champion drubs all opponents with strategic moves.
meanings.sent2: The soccer team drubs their rival in a thrilling match.
meanings.sent3: The clever student drubs the math test, surprising everyone with a perfect score.
meanings.sent4: The sun drubs the darkness, bringing light to the world each morning.
meanings.sent5: The hero drubs the villain in an epic battle, saving the day with bravery.
